name: dead, like my darlings
description:
this is "dead, like my darlings," for #HellYeahPoetryJam. dlmd is an interactive poem built in twine about boredom (sincere boredom) that requires your participation. it will take under 5 minutes to complete.

warning: this poem has shaking and blinking text. it uses violent imagery and briefly touches on emetophobia and drug use.
